body_html: @ilblackdragon I do see your point. I had assumed the goal of SKCompat was to be compatible with scikit-learn, but I can see that is not the case. Its easy enough for me to just wrap it myself when I need the to use TensorFlow models with Scikit-Learn operations that expect standard calls (e.g. grids and ensembles). Thanks for the information!
